timeline.bodyText:
I am a little surprised this compiles, but should be safe at runtime.
Should these new methods eventually have an implementation that would produce the expected type?
timeline.author: lahodaj

timeline.bodyText: We are giving up the ability to run tests without nb-javac on JDK<14. Possibly not that big issue as we are not running the tests in that combination anyway.
